roleset.name: abandon in a remote place, e.g. a desert island

example.name: alias-v
example.text: As Mr. Starch seemed to be particularly averse to having his throat cut, we only marooned him on a small key off the bay of Cadenas, where he may have subsisted on a barrel of pork and a keg of molasses, which we left him, up to the present time, for aught I know to the contrary.
example.arg: As Mr. Starch seemed to be particularly averse to having his throat cut,
on a small key off the bay of Cadenas, where he may have subsisted on a barrel of pork and a keg of molasses, which we left him, up to the present time, for aught I know to the contrary.

roleset.note: MAROON-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.
